title: new poppy's E seem a bit weak?
body:
from being a fighter/assassin to becoming a tank after her rework, Doesn't the change of poppy's e to physical damage as well as the reduction of base damage seem a little bit strange since tanks are supposed to have high base damages?'
 

Not only that but the ratios on both her E and ult seem a little low. Other than that her new rework is actually really fun.

replies.body: The Stun duration is (1.6 / 1.7 / 1.8 / 1.9 / 2) though, it used to be 1.5 at all ranks and her buckler damage is pretty high and having a Ranged auto attack with 20-190 (depending on your Champ level) Bonus magic damage plus your auto damage that can apply Deadman's and on-hit effects (Cleaver etc) she sorta has a lot of power in other areas compared to her old base damage on all-ins. (I leech of mellee laners with Bandit) 10g per auto or buckler, they can't do much about it and I get 10g basically every 5 seconds in all-ins and play her as a support as well as a top laner because of her kit, buckler lets me execute minions easier and at range and lets me leech gold off and harass my opponents but I get the 10g instead of the ranges reduced 3g.

(I leech of mellee laners with Bandit) 10g per auto or buckler, they can't do much about it and I get 10g basically every 5 seconds in all-ins and play her as a support as well as a top laner because of her kit, buckler lets me execute minions easier and at range and lets me leech gold off and harass my opponents but I get the 10g instead of the ranges reduced 3g.

yeah I guess she pretty strong in some area's but I'm kinda feel butthurt that vayne's knockback does more damage and also knocks the target further back

> [{quoted}](name=Lauricella3,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=v4E9mZVG,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-12-10T14:03:02.469+0000)
>
> yeah I guess she pretty strong in some area's but I'm kinda feel butthurt that vayne's knockback does more damage and also knocks the target further back

I'm just butthurt she hasn't been nerfed into the ground yet, since she's like Tier 1 and is that broken a Champion when she hits lategame you either kill her as 5 or lose which is basically impossible, or catch her out which is also very unlikely.
